Last updated: August 29, 2015 

Allstate℠ Mobile By Allstate (the "Application") 

End User License Agreement 

This End User License Agreement ("Agreement") outlines the terms related to your use of this Application provided to you by Allstate Insurance Company and its affiliates, including Northbrook Services, Inc. (collectively, "Allstate"). The Application includes all software, computer code, data and components of Allstate℠ Mobile provided by Allstate. For purposes of this Agreement, you will be referred to as "You" or "End User" and Allstate shall be referred to as "Our" or "Allstate." 

This Agreement does not change or amend in any way the Usage Rules set forth in the Google Play store Terms and Conditions. 

BY DOWNLOADING OR USING THE APPLICATION, YOU ACCEPT THESE TERMS OF USE. IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THEM, DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR USE THE APPLICATION. 

IF YOU ACCESS ANY INTERNET-BASED SERVICES VIA LINKS IN THE APPLICATION, YOUR USE OF THOSE SERVICES WILL BE SUBJECT TO BOTH THIS AGREEMENT AND ANY SEPARATELY PROVIDED TERMS OF USE AND PRIVACY STATEMENT ON SUCH WEB SITE. 

Allstate reserves the right, in its discretion, to modify or change this Agreement at any time without prior notice to You. Your continued use of the Application following the posting of any changes to the Agreement constitutes acceptance of those changes. 

You may incur data charges in using the Application. 

LICENSE. Provided You comply with this Agreement, Allstate grants You a revocable, limited, non-transferrable, non-exclusive license to use the Application on any Android phone or device that You own or control and as permitted by Usage Rules set forth in the Google Play store Terms and Conditions. 

AGE REQUIREMENT. This Application is available to users of all ages. However, if You are under the age of 18, You should review this Agreement with Your parent or guardian to make sure that You or Your parent or guardian understand the terms contained in this Agreement. 

DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY. This Application is licensed "as-is," "with all faults," and "as available." You bear the risk of using the Application. Allstate, on behalf of itself, distributors of the Application, its licensors, network operators over whose network the Application is distributed, and each of their respective affiliates and suppliers, gives no express or implied warranties, guarantees, or conditions under or in relation to the Application, including, but not limited to, warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. Allstate does not warrant that the functionality or operation of the Application will be uninterrupted or free from error, that any defects in the Application will be corrected, or that the Application or the server(s) that makes it available are free of viruses or other harmful conditions or components. 

INFORMATION; DATA USAGE; CLAIMS. All information submitted by You or collected through this Application is the property of Allstate. This includes, but is not limited to, pictures and messages, information about Your device (for example, the device identifier, the advertising identifier, and the make and model) and its state, device application permissions, and vehicle and estimate information. Allstate may associate such information with your personal information that we collect or otherwise obtain in order to optimize Our online and mobile advertising programs. Allstate may also collect and store, or direct a third party to collect and store, information about the physical location of Your device by using, for example, wireless network, cell phone tower, and satellite signals. Such location information is approximate (based on factors such as obstructions, beacon orientation, and environmental surroundings) and may be combined with other information submitted by You or collected through the Application. This information may be used by Allstate and third parties to identify Your geographical location, to improve the Application, and to provide You with location-based content, including advertising for products and services. Allstate may use information You submit as part of any claim investigation or for any other insurance related or otherwise permissible purpose. Submission of information via this Application does not mean Your claim will be paid. Payment of Your claim is subject to all policy terms and conditions in addition to any applicable laws and regulations. 

ALLSTATE PRODUCTS. Allstate may change the programs or products mentioned in this Application at any time without notice. Additionally, all insurance products referred to in this Application are subject to availability and qualifications. Product terms, conditions, and exclusions not described in this Application may apply. 

OWNERSHIP; PROPRIETARY RIGHTS; RESTRICTIONS. The Application, including all text, graphics, user and visual interfaces, trademarks, logos, computer code, software, data, components, documentation and other content (collectively, the "Content"), is exclusively the property of Allstate and its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark and other intellectual property laws. Except as expressly provided in this Agreement, no part of the Application or Content, in whole or in part, may be copied, reproduced, duplicated, sold, republished, reposted or otherwise distributed for public or commercial use. You agree not to modify, port, translate or creative derivative works of, or from, the Application. You further agree not to decompile, disassemble, reverse engineer or otherwise attempt to derive, reconstruct, identify or discover any source code, underlying ideas, or algorithms from the Application. The use of third-party trademarks therein is intended to denote interoperability and does not constitute: (i) an affiliation by Allstate and its licensors with such company, or (ii) an endorsement or approval of such company of Allstate and its licensors and its products and services. 

LINKS TO OTHER WEB SITES. This Application may contain links to other web sites. Allstate provides links to other sites as a convenience to persons who use the Application. Allstate is not responsible for examining or evaluating the content or accuracy of any such third-party material or web site. Allstate does not warrant or endorse and does not assume and will not have any liability or responsibility for any third-party materials or web sites, or for any other materials, products, or services of third parties. If You choose to use the services provided by those sites, You may be asked by those sites to provide certain personally identifiable information (some of which may, on an individual or aggregated basis, be shared with Allstate). Please be aware that Allstate is not responsible for the privacy practices of those sites, even though Allstate's name or logo may appear on those sites. We encourage You to be aware when You leave Our Application. You should read the privacy policies of each web site that You visit, as the privacy policies of those sites may differ from Ours. 

SPEECH DATA. "Speech Data" means the audio files, associated transcripts and log files provided by the End User hereunder or generated in connection with the Application. Allstate and/or its licensors collect and use Speech Data to tune, enhance and improve the speech recognition and other components of the Application. In accepting this Agreement, You acknowledge, consent and agree that Allstate and/or its licensors may collect Speech Data as part of Your use of the Application and that such information shall only be used by Allstate and its licensors, or third parties acting under the direction of Allstate and/or its licensors pursuant to confidentiality agreements, to tune, enhance, improve the speech recognition and other components of the Application and other products and services owned, licensed or developed by Allstate and its licensors. 

LIMITATION OF LIABILITY. To the extent permitted by law, Allstate and its licensors disclaim liability, whether based in contract, tort, negligence, strict liability or otherwise, for damages of any kind (including, but not limited to, direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, special, punitive and exemplary damages) in any way arising out of or in connection with the Application, service interruptions, delays in operation or transmission, or third-party access to personal information input in or collected through the Application, even if Allstate and its licensors have express knowledge of the possibility of such damages. Allstate and its licensors have no responsibility, and will in no way be held liable, for the security of the End User’s mobile device. You agree not to seek to recover any damages, including consequential, lost profits, special, indirect or incidental damages from Allstate, its licensors, or any distributor of the Application. 

SUPPORT SERVICES. The Application is provided "as is." Neither Allstate, its suppliers, distributors of the Application, Your device manufacturer, nor Your network operator are responsible for providing maintenance or support services for the Application. 

GOVERNING LAW. This Application is controlled, operated and intended for use only in the United States of America. We do not represent that materials in this Application are appropriate or made available for use outside of the United States of America. This Agreement shall be governed by and interpreted according to the law of the state of Illinois, excluding that body of law applicable to the conflicts of law. 

SEVERABILITY. If any provision of this Agreement is held invalid, void or unenforceable, then that provision is considered severable from the remaining provisions, and the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. Allstate's failure to enforce any right or provision in this Agreement will not constitute a waiver of such provision, or any other provision in this Agreement. 

MISCELLANEOUS. You agree to comply with all local, state, federal, and national laws, statutes, ordinances, and regulations that apply to Your use of the Application.
